full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN DPAL CHEN PADMA GA-YANG GSANG KHROS PA LA BRTEN PA'I TSOGS 'KHOR LO'I CHO GA YID BZHIN DBANG RGYAL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,CES BCOM LDAN DPAL CHOG PADMA GA-YANG 'GSANG KHROS PA LA BRTEN PA'I TSOGS KYI 'KHOR LO'I CHO GA YID BZHIN DBANG RGYAL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RIGS RUS MNGON PAR MTHO BA DANG LDAN RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA SKYU @008B SKYES BLO BZANG PADMA DBANG CHEN ZHES BYA BAS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR, SLOB MA'I THA SHAL SU MA TI AARTHA SIDDHI'I MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SPOBS PA'I SHES RAB DANG LDAN PA BRTZON 'GRUS CHO BA THO YON SHES RAB RGYA MTSO'O, ,BKRA SHIS, ,)
